choices: One of your friends.
A member of your family.
A neighbour.
A teenage kid. You've seen him around but don't really know him.
A complete stranger.
1.content:
It seemed just like any other day when you woke. Little did you know that everything was about to change. Your life would never be the same again! One moment, you are walking along and minding your own business. You sense a presence behind you but before you can turn around, strong hands grab you from behind and a chloroform soaked rag is held over your nose. You black out.

Some time later, you start to come around. You wonder where you are. For a minute, everything seems ridiculously huge and then you realise the terrifying truth. You have been shrunk! You are now no more than two inches tall. The door opens and a giant figure walks into the room, a strange expression on his face as he looks at you and grins.

Who is your captor?
1.title: SHRUNK!

choices: Adam, 21 years old. The party animal. He's a wild guy!
David, 23 years old.The popular guy - sexy, charismatic and altheletic.
Chris, 22 years old. Your chubby mate who is always eating.
Karim, 21 years old. Dusky skinned and handsome.
Another friend?
11.content:
"Glad to see you're awake, my friend!" he says as he towers over you. You are shocked. You thought this guy was your friend. What the hell is going on?

Which friend is it?
11.title: One of your friends.

choices: You beg Chris to spare your life.
You ask Chris why he is doing this.
Before you can speak, Chris stuffs you hungrily into his mouth.
113.content:
You can hardly believe your eyes as you recognise Chris, one of your closest friends. Chris is 22 years old and you have known him since you were both small boys. Always a chubby kid, Chris has grown into a decidedly fat young man. He looks directly at you and you feel distinctly uneasy at the expression on his face. He licks his lips slowly and deliberately as he stares at you with the same longing he normally reserves for his meals.

"Chris?" you say, reeling in shock at this turn of events. "What the fuck have you done to me?"

"Isn't it obvious?" Chris laughs. "I've shrunk you. Cool, huh?"

"Why?"

"Can't you guess?" Chris teased, patting his huge belly playfully.

"You've got to be fucking kidding!" you reply.

"Since when have I ever joked about food, huh?" Chris said, reaching out a hand to snatch you up from the table. Desperately, you try to dodge out of the way but his pudgy fingers are surprisingly quick and you find yourself being lifted into the air and held directly in front of Chris's mouth...
113.title: Chubby Chris is hungry!

choices: Uncle Ray, 55 years old. Big bellied and greedy. He's always been good to you.
Dan, 25 years old. Your older brother. He's always pushed you around.
Lewis, 12 years old. Your annoying kid brother.
James, your 26 year old cousin. Muscular and mean, you've never liked him.
Another member of your family.
12.content:
"Surprise!" he says as he towers over you. You are shocked. What the hell is going on?

Which member of your family is towering over you?
12.title: A member of your family.

choices: Jason, the guy from over the road. He's 25 and very fit.
Mr Johnson, your next door neighbour. 53 years old. A fat slob.
Mr Powell, a kindly elderly man in his 70s.
Mr Rogers, a wealthy business man. 45 years old.
Another neighbour?
13.content:
"Wakey wakey!" he says as he towers over you. You are shocked. You know this guy. What the hell is going on?

Which neighbour is it?
13.title: A neighbour.

choices: Carlos, the charmer. 18 years old. Perfect teeth and toned body.
Scott, the fat kid. 16 years old. Greasy brown hair and always eating.
Dean, the tough kid. 17 years old. A bully with a cruel streak.
Darrell, the joker. 15 year old black kid who likes to wind people up.
Another teen.
14.content:
Your blood runs cold as you realise the identity of your captor. It is one of a local gang of teenage boys who have been making a nuisance of themselves in the area. These kids are rude and intimidating at the best of times. What the hell does this kid want with you?

Your captor is...
14.title: A teenage kid. You've seen him around but d...

choices: He plans to eat you now
You're going to be his toy for now
You're going to be sold to someone else
143.content:
As your vision clears, and your other senses slowly start to come into focus, you first become aware of a voice amidst the blurry shapes of the world. "... king up." You groan, moving to rub your eyes, but find that your muscles are incredibly sore. It hurts to even move them, as if you'd been lying in a terrible sleeping position for an entire night. Thankfully it seems to be fading with a bit of movement.

But as you come to, you realize something's off. You can't feel your bed or sheets around you. Or anything you'd associate with your own home. In fact, while the world comes into focus again, you realize this isn't your room. The first thing you can make out is a massive orb in the sky. It has a smaller dark circle in the whiteness, and it almost seems to be focused on you... In fact, it almost looks like....

An eye.

Your eyes go wide as a sense of urgency suddenly invades your mind. Adrenaline floods your system, speeding up your boot-up process. And soon, you can tell you're on a giant hand. And a giant is looking down at you. It doesn't take much to recognize him. Dean, the local bully who terrorized everyone smaller and younger than him. And considering the 17 year old brat towered over everyone his age, that wasn't hard. But why were you tiny?! And in his company!?

"Aw, you up little guy?" he says in a taunting voice, bringing up a massive finger to poke your side. Just that impact causes you to fall to your ass. You couldn't have been any larger than an inch to this ass! "Took you long enough."

"What's going on, Dean!" you demand, getting to your feet. It's then that you realize you are stark naked, a cold breeze chilling your exposed form. it's hard to keep any semblance of dignity in this state. Almost immediately, the teen's expression hardens.

"Hey, remember who you're talking to, runt!" he snaps, his voice booming around you. "You can call me Master from now on. Well, as long as you're around that is."

That last statement sends a chill down your spine. "Wh-what?"

Dean grins cruelly, reaching down to pinch you between 2 fingers. You can't do anything to resist, soon lifted skyward between two fleshy pillars. And most terrifying, you're brought to his massive lips. Before you know it, his pink whale of a tongue slips between them, and slurps up between your legs. You recoil in shock and disgust, but even just that contact is enough to make your tiny cock harden.

"Mmm, just how I like em~" he moans.
143.title: Much Bigger Bully

choices: Ragged clothes and unkempt hair. He's a tramp and he looks hungry!
This guy is a man mountain with long hair and a beard. He looks like a wrestler!
A smartly dressed older man with grey hair. He looks wealthy and powerful.
A sexy black guy in his mid 20s. He's obviously a regular gym jock.
Another man?
15.content: You've never seen this guy before. What does he look like?
15.title: A complete stranger.

info.brief_description: You are shrunk by another man who intends to tease you and then swallow you whole.
info.description:
In recent years, the number of disappearances has suddenly increased with men disappearing seemingly at random, never to be seen again. Behind these disappearances is a secret cabal of gay men who have developed the technology to shrink people. They kidnap other men off the streets, shrink them and tease them before eating them alive. This is the story of one of their shrunken victims.

You are an ordinary everyday guy. You don't know it yet, but your life is about to change forever. You have caught the attention of a man who sees you as nothing more than food, a man who gets a kick out of shrinking, teasing and then swallowing other men.
